title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 64: Featuring Jordan Eberle
description:
On this week's show, New York Islander Jordan Eberle checks in with his former teammate and housemate. He talks about the trade from Edmonton, playing with Mathew Barzal, being a commuter, how Whits bullied his way into living with him, playing Tiger Woods for high-stakes, and a bunch more. Whits and RA also chat about another lackluster All-Star Weekend, Mike Fisher's short retirement, Jaromir Jagr's long goodbye, Super Bowl bets/predictions, an anniversary, and close up with #AllRightHamilton questions.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
